sentences.sentence: The agreement marks 15 years in negotiations, and it's directed at international waters that are not currently under the control or protection of nations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: It will also knit together different regional treaties, paving the way for conservation efforts to better protect a number of marine species, including dolphins, sea turtles and many fish.

sentences.sentence: Tens of thousands of protesters took to the streets of Athens on Sunday over the deadly train crash in Larissa, which killed at least 57 people, mainly students. Tear gas and stun grenades were used when violent clashes broke out between police and demonstrators outside the Greek parliament. The crowds gathered after calls by rail workers and public sector employees to express their grief and anger. Flowers were laid on the tracks at a railway station in northern Greece to honour the victims of those who died in the tragedy.
